description.value:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgIounStone0000]{Ioun Stone}

When you take a Action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

As a Action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it's orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

While this dark-blue rhomboid orbits your head, you have Advantage on Initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

effects.name: Enhanced Awareness: Initiative and Perception
